alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 4:57PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A gust front will impact portions of east central Lincoln and west central Spokane Counties through 530 PM PDT... At 456 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front along a line extending from 11 miles east of Davenport to Fairchild AFB. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Patchy blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Brief reductions in visibility may occur. Locations impacted include... Spokane, Airway Heights, Fairchild AFB, Town And Country, Reardan and Deep Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
